name: nfe-xml-to-xlsx-firefox-extension
description: Firefox extension to convert NFe XML files to Excel using fast-xml-parser

scripts.prepare: npm run generate-icons && npm run build
scripts.prepare:firefox: npm run generate-icons && npm run build:firefox
scripts.publish: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.publish:firefox: npm run generate-icons && npm run build:firefox && npm run package:firefox

author: Adrian Perez
